name: somsri-thaipersonalassistant
0:
”Alexa, ask sohm si to sing song”
”Alexa, ask sohm si to perd TV”
”Alexa, ask sohm si to peed TV”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sohm si
des: Somsri (som-si). A Thai personal assistant who will assist you to control your smart home, or make a party joke with her singing skill. Command tv and home theater or other device with Thai word commands. If you'd like to learn to speak simple thai, you may love to try this skill.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
